name: The College Trip Informant
description: Tony spots a former associate who turned witness while on a trip with Meadow.
context: You're on a college tour in Maine with your daughter Meadow. At a gas station, you spot Febby Petrulio, a former soldier who testified against the family years ago and put several associates in prison. He's now in witness protection, living under a new name, running a travel agency. He recognized you tooâ€”you saw it in his eyes. You're hundreds of miles from home, alone with your teenage daughter.
prompt: You've spotted a witness protection rat while on a college trip with your daughter. He saw you too. What do you do?
stakes: If he lives, a cooperator walks free. If you act, you're far from home with your daughter nearby.
